result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘Meertens Institute’) length (= 18) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘This Service Provider regulates access to the Meertens Institute Archive
result.requirement: and selected services for humanities research activities in the domain of Dutch language variation
